description: This file defines the User entity class in the domain layer, representing application users with properties for email, display name, password hash and salt, creation timestamp, and associated notes.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class representing a user in the application, with properties for identity, contact info, password security, creation timestamp, and related notes.

methods.name: User()
methods.description: Default constructor initializing properties with default values including a new GUID, empty strings, empty byte arrays, current UTC time, and an empty list of notes.
